assets.description: To promote the launch of Season Four of The League, Click 3X teamed up with FX to conceive and edit a series of six promo teases.  Set up as a parody of Wrangler's Brett Favre campaign, each character's scene features gut-busting improv, snappy dialogue, and the wide-eyed commitment of the actors, all aimed at keeping you laughing throughout.
assets.title: The League
